name: Wondervision Technologies
overview:
Wonder Vision Technologies was started by a team of top notch professionals from the software industry. They have worked for top IT companies in India and abroad before starting out on this venture. They have wide range of expertise in software consulting, product development, web designing and project management.

The management team brings around 25 years of years of combined IT experience in various levels across different domains like retail, automobile, banking/insurance and healthcare.

Our team comprises of highly talented, self motivated individuals who work very closely with our customers from the beginning to the end of the project.

Are you looking for top quality software at an affordable price? It is our privilege to help you. We want to partner and work closely with you and satisfy your software needs.

We have great expertise in the following areas. We work closely with the customer to understand their needs, and after a careful thought process powered by our expertise, we come out with the best solution within their budget and time.

Software development We provide software development in various flavors customizing to the needs of the customer. We have deep expertise in the following areas J2EE development – Enterprise applications with cutting edge technologies Web designing – Basic to all types of advanced websites Ecommerce application development – Using J2EE, .NET and opensource technologies Open source technologies – PHP, Ruby on Rails Database technologies – Oracle, SQL server, MySQL Mobile application development – Android platform UI design – Flex, jQuery, HTML 5

Web Design We have collaboration with Hues Media design, who are pioneers in usability and design. We develop web sites for a wide variety of users based on their needs. Some of our area of specialization includes HTML/php websites,ASP.NET, J2EE powered websites Joomla, WordPress Content Management Systems Web hosting (various plans available) Shopping cart integration

Software Maintenance: We undertake software maintenance and re-engineering/re-architecture. If you feel that your existing system is out dated, or it is not performing well, please contact us. We will put our expertise into it and provide you the best results. Some of our services in this area include Database performance tuning UI redesign Technology migration (from existing technology to another one) Performance engineering Web site/Web application maintenance
